element.name: Ring of Mistvision
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: While attuned to and wearing this ring, you can see through areas that are heavily obscured by non-magical mist, fog, rain or smoke.

element.name: Ring of Lesser Fiendshape
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: While attuned to and wearing this ring, it has 1 charge that is regained at dawn. As an action on your turn, you can spend that charge to temporarily turn yourself into a fiend of challenge rating 2 or lower.
Spending the charge to turn into a fiend works the same way as the druid's Wildshape feature.

element.name: Ring of Greater Fiendshape
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: While attuned to and wearing this ring, it has 2 charges that are regained at dawn. As an action on your turn, you can spend that charge to temporarily turn yourself into a fiend of challenge rating 4 or lower.
Spending the charge to turn into a fiend works the same way as the druid's Wildshape feature.

element.name: Ring of Magical Aura
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: Once per short rest, you can cast Nystul's Magical Aura around yourself or an item you carry.

element.name: Ring of Magic Barrage
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: While attuned to and wearing this ring, whenever you critically hit with a spell that targets at least one creature, deals damage and you have to make an attack roll as part of it, you shoot out an extra projectile or ray towards a target creature of your choice that you could attack with the spell.
